maml:description.maml:para: Adds a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Assignment Job
This function adds a workspace manager group and adds the child workspaces
The name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager assignment. if no value is provided a GUID will be generated and added to the name groupname. 'myGroup(afbd324f-6c48-459c-8710-8d1e1cd03812)'
The name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager assignment. if no value is provided a GUID will be generated and added to the name groupname. 'myGroup(afbd324f-6c48-459c-8710-8d1e1cd03812)'

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Add-AzWorkspaceManagerAssignment -WorkspaceName "myWorkspace" -Name "AlertRules" -GroupName 'myGroup' Adds a Workspace Manager Assignment to the workspace with the name 'AlertRules' and assigns this to the group 'myGroup'.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Add-AzWorkspaceManagerAssignment -WorkspaceName "myWorkspace" -GroupName 'myGroup' Adds a Workspace Manager Assignment to the workspace with the name 'myGroup(<GUID>)' and assigns this to the group 'myGroup'.

maml:description.maml:para: Adds a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Group
This function adds a workspace manager group and adds the child workspaces
The name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager group
The name of the workspace manager assignment. if no value is provided a GUID will be generated and added to the name groupname. 'myGroup(afbd324f-6c48-459c-8710-8d1e1cd03812)'
The ResourceId's of the items that to be added to the Workspace Manager Assignment. This can be a single value or an array of values.
The name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager group
The name of the workspace manager assignment. if no value is provided a GUID will be generated and added to the name groupname. 'myGroup(afbd324f-6c48-459c-8710-8d1e1cd03812)'
The ResourceId's of the items that to be added to the Workspace Manager Assignment. This can be a single value or an array of values.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Adds a Workspace Manager Assignment to the workspace with the name 'AlertRules' and assigns this to the group 'myGroup'.
Adds a Workspace Manager Assignment to the workspace with the name 'myGroup(<GUID>)' and assigns this to the group 'myGroup'.

maml:description.maml:para: Adds a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Group
This function adds a workspace manager group and adds the child workspaces
The name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager group
The description of the workspace manager group. If not specified, the name will be used.
The name of the workspace manager member(s) to add to the workspace manager group
The name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager group
The description of the workspace manager group. If not specified, the name will be used.
The name of the workspace manager member(s) to add to the workspace manager group

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Add-AzWorkspaceManagerGroups -WorkspaceName "myWorkspace" -Name "Banks" -Description "" -workspaceManagerMembers 'myWorkspace(afbd324f-6c48-459c-8710-8d1e1cd03812)' Adds a Workspace Manager Group to the workspace with the name 'Banks' and adds a child workspace with the name 'myWorkspace(afbd324f-6c48-459c-8710-8d1e1cd03812)' to the group.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Add-AzWorkspaceManagerGroups -WorkspaceName "myWorkspace" -ResourceGroupName 'MyRg' -Name "Banks" -Description "Group of all financial and banking institutions" -workspaceManagerMembers @('myWorkspace(afbd324f-6c48-459c-8710-8d1e1cd03812)', 'otherWorkspace(f5fa104e-c0e3-4747-9182-d342dc048a9e)') Adds a Workspace Manager Group to the workspace and adds multiple child workspaces to the group.

maml:description.maml:para: Add a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Member

The Add-AzWorkspaceManagerMembers cmdlet adds a workspace manager member to the configuration. These members are workspaces that are linked to the workspace manager configuration. and used to provision Microsoft Sentinel workspaces. The Workspace Manager Member name is constructed as follows: <workspaceName>(<subscriptionId>)
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The ResourceId of the target workspace to add as a member
The TenantId of the target workspace to add as a member
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The ResourceId of the target workspace to add as a member
The TenantId of the target workspace to add as a member

maml:alert.maml:para: The Workspace Manager Member name is constructed as follows: <workspaceName>(<subscriptionId>)

dev:remarks.maml:para: Name : myChildWorkspace( * ) ResourceGroupName : myRG ResourceType : Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerMembers WorkspaceName : myWorkspace ResourceId : /subscriptions/ */resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myWorkspace/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerMembers/myChildWorkspace( *) Tags : Properties : @{targetWorkspaceResourceId=/subscriptions/ */resourceGroups/myRemoteRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myChildWorkspace; targetWorkspaceTenantId= *}
This example adds a Workspace Manager Member for the workspace with the name 'myWorkspace' and adds the workspace with the name 'myChildWorkspace' as a member.
PS > Add-AzWorkspaceManagerMembers -WorkspaceName "myWorkspace" -ResourceId $resourceIds -TenantId " * "

Name : myChildWorkspace( * ) ResourceGroupName : myRG ResourceType : Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerMembers WorkspaceName : myWorkspace ResourceId : /subscriptions/ */resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myWorkspace/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerMembers/myChildWorkspace( *) Tags : Properties : @{targetWorkspaceResourceId=/subscriptions/ */resourceGroups/myRemoteRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myChildWorkspace; targetWorkspaceTenantId= *}

Name : myChildWorkspace( * ) ResourceGroupName : myRG ResourceType : Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerMembers WorkspaceName : myWorkspace ResourceId : /subscriptions/ */resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myWorkspace/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerMembers/myOtherWorkspace( *) Tags : Properties : @{targetWorkspaceResourceId=/subscriptions/ */resourceGroups/myRemoteRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myOtherWorkspace; targetWorkspaceTenantId= *} This example adds a multiple Members from from an array into the workspace manager with the name 'myWorkspace'

maml:description.maml:para: Gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager

The Get-AzWorkspaceManager cmdlet retrieves a Workspace Manager Configuration from the Log Analytics workspace. You can retrieve the workspace manager configuration by using just provding a workspacename. Only one workspace manager configuration can be added per Microsoft Sentinel instance
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located

dev:remarks.maml:para: Name : myWorkspace ResourceGroupName : myRG ResourceType : Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations WorkspaceName : myWorkspace ResourceId : /subscriptions/<REDACTED>/resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myWorkspace/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations/myWorkspace Tags : Properties : @{mode=Enabled} This command gets the workspace manager for the workspace 'myWorkspace'

Name : myWorkspace ResourceGroupName : myRG ResourceType : Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations WorkspaceName : myWorkspace ResourceId : /subscriptions/<REDACTED>/resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myWorkspace/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations/myWorkspace Tags : Properties : @{mode=Enabled}

This command gets the workspace manager for the workspace 'myWorkspace' in resource group 'myRg' Specifying the resource group is only needed if multiple workspaces with the same name are available in the subscription.

Gets a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Member

The Get-AzWorkspaceManagerMembers cmdlet gets workspace manager member(s) from the configuration. The members can be queried by providing a workspace name or by providing a workspace manager member name.
Enter the Name of the log analytics workspace
Enter the name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located

dev:remarks.maml:para: This command gets the workspace manager member(s) from the workspace configuration 'myWorkspace'
This command gets the workspace manager member myChildWorkspace from the workspace configuration 'myWorkspace'

maml:description.maml:para: Remove Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager

The Remove-AzWorkspaceManager cmdlet retrieves a Workspace Manager Configuration and removes it from the Log Analytics workspace. You can remove the workspace manager configuration by just providing a workspacename.
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Confirms the removal of the Workspace manager configuration.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Confirms the removal of the Workspace manager configuration.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This command removes the workspace manager member myChildWorkspace from the workspace configuration 'myWorkspace'
This command removes the workspace manager member myChildWorkspace from the workspace configuration 'myWorkspace' without confirmation
This command removes all workspace manager members from the workspace configuration 'myWorkspace' without confirmation

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a Workspace Manager Configuration

The Set-AzWorkspaceManager cmdlet creates a Workspace Manager Configuration that is required to use workspace manager feature. You can create a workspace manager configuration by using just a workspacename. The minimum requirement to to enable the workspace manager is that Microsoft Sentinel is enabled on the Log Analytics workspace. Only one workspace manager configuration can be added per Microsoft Sentinel instance.
Name of the log analytics workspace
Name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Status of the Workspace Manager (Enabled or Disabled)
Name of the log analytics workspace
Name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Status of the Workspace Manager (Enabled or Disabled)

dev:remarks.maml:para: Name : myWorkspace ResourceGroupName : myRG ResourceType : Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations WorkspaceName : myWorkspace ResourceId : /subscriptions/<REDACTED>/resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myWorkspace/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations/myWorkspace Tags : Properties : @{mode=Enabled}
This command creates / enables the workspace manager on the Sentinel workspace 'myWorkspace'

Name : myWorkspace ResourceGroupName : myRG ResourceType : Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations WorkspaceName : myWorkspace ResourceId : /subscriptions/<REDACTED>/resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myWorkspace/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations/myWorkspace Tags : Properties : @{mode=Disabled}
This command sets the workspace manager to disabled

Name : myWorkspace ResourceGroupName : myRG ResourceType : Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations WorkspaceName : myWorkspace ResourceId : /subscriptions/<REDACTED>/resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myWorkspace/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations/myWorkspace Tags : Properties : @{mode=Enabled}

This command enables the workspace manager for the workspace 'myWorkspace' in resource group 'myRg' Specifying the resource group is only needed if multiple workspaces with the same name are available in the subscription.
